body:
I didn't know this had poor grammar

I just fap to doujins

No, we shouldn't encourage this level of quality. This isn't even what i'd call "mediocre" this is far, far from that. Tolerating low quality TLs is exactly the reason why we have this problem in the first place. Shitty TL like this dooms the doujin from ever getting proper translation because most translators will see that it's english tagged and won't bother doing it.
I suppose we shouldn't be so hard on this, it was his frist transration after all.

"Hamakaze, I'll lend you today for this motor"

Why wasn't the MOTORBOATING tag applied?!
poor grammar is the hottest tag
I love how poor grammar has become an actual tag
